last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 4
last_episode_to_air.overview: The case comes to court, and the victims’ families discover the truth of what happened to their loved ones as new revelations emerge.

name: The Sixth Commandment
overview: A series that dramatises the shocking story of the true-life murder of former Stowe schoolmaster and deeply closeted evangelical Christian, 69-year-old Peter Farquhar  by his 28-year-old student and young churchwarden Ben Field in October 2015.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: A meeting between an inspirational teacher and a charismatic student in Buckinghamshire ends up setting the stage for one of the most complex criminal cases in recent memory.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: As a community mourns, Ben begins a relationship with Peter’s neighbour, Ann Moore-Martin, to the increasing concern of her niece Ann-Marie.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: The true picture comes to light when Thames Valley Police open an investigation and close in on their prime suspect, making some alarming discoveries along the way.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: The case comes to court, and the victims’ families discover the truth of what happened to their loved ones as new revelations emerge.
